name: Priorities (firesyrup)
description:
PRIORITIES

You start the game with fucks from 0 to 10, eleven text files in total.

1 First, you should go into each one of eleven subfolders and read the context. DO NOT read the results yet.
2 Your goal is to prioritize and distribute your limited fucks into different folders.
3 After you're done, you can read the relevant results file in each folder and copy the text under YOUR STORY in the README file.
4 If you end up with more than 10 misery, uncompress the "OPEN ONLY IF  YOU HAVE OVER 10 MISERY" archive when you are done.
